creditline: The Alfred and Ingrid Lenz Harrison Fund
description: framed opening (window?) at center; photographs taped to pressed board walls; hat on chair, LRC
marks: Signature, Title, Date, Edition and Label see Mark
text: If a picture can invoke a thousand words, this photograph of photographs offers a nearly complete biography. From a baby in a carrier to school photos to family celebrations, the images assembled in the bedroom of an unseen couple allow us to imagine their life together—while begging the question of who they are today.
title: The Reverend and Margaret's Bedroom, Vicksburg, Mississippi
